verses.name: 2 Samuel 19:35
verses.text: I am this day fourscore years old: and can I discern between good and evil? can thy servant taste what I eat or what I drink? can I hear any more the voice of singing men and singing women? wherefore then should thy servant be yet a burden unto my lord the king?

verses.name: 2 Samuel 19:36
verses.text: Thy servant will go a little way over Jordan with the king: and why should the king recompense it me with such a reward?
